title: Straight

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
If there has ever been / eventually is a sequence of 4 numbers incremented by 1 by card number (i.e. 3__1__, 82__2__, 5__3__, 201__4__), you instantly win.
- In the meantime, for every time there is a sequence of 2 numbers incremented by 1 only after playing this card, discard a card.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:
fields.value:
black:1106265022453268530> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:white:1107514189574045726> + <:brown:1107516362903007232> ): The 1st sequence is reduced to 3 numbers for you to win.
- The 2nd sequence keeps its affect.
- At any point in the game, you may effectively change the card number of a cards in your hand twice.

desc:
Post 2345
- This card cannot be affected by **Plus** or **Minus**.
